teaser: Airing on Monday, January 26, 2015: Dish goes over the top with Sling, and enters the growing universe of alternatives to traditional cable. We take a look at the competitive landscape on the other side of the equation. Plus, we check in on the health of the bitcoin market. With today's introduction of a new bitcoin exchange, will we see a reduction in the currency's volatility?
description: Airing on Monday, January 26, 2015: Dish goes over the top with Sling, and enters the growing universe of alternatives to traditional cable. We take a look at the competitive landscape on the other side of the equation. Plus, we check in on the health of the bitcoin market. With today's introduction of a new bitcoin exchange, will we see a reduction in the currency's volatility?
byline: Tracey Samuelson, Nova Safo, Mitchell Hartman, Kai Ryssdal and Rob Schmitz
title: Marketplace for Monday, January 26, 2015
